name: Tumblr Tags Wrap Fix
description: Tired of clicking and dragging through everyones tag rambles? This will make it magically wrap and stack so you can see the entire thing in one go!

user.name: Jitaroo
user.about: Hi, I'm Jitaroo, I write codes for various sites out of personal interest. Not a serious coder when it comes to these styles but I hope you like anything I happen to produce. :3 Donations are greatly appreciated.
